CustomField.description: Indicates the level of enforcement required for serial number uniqueness. Strict: Only unique serial numbers will be permitted Soft: Warning message for uniqueness violations None: No warning/error for duplicate serial numbers
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the level of enforcement required for serial number uniqueness. Strict: Only unique serial numbers will be permitted Soft: Warning message for uniqueness violations None: No warning/error for duplicate serial numbers
CustomField.label: Enforcing Uniqueness of Serial Number
